constituent: paragraph, craft, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: To the right we see a head and to the left an element that means craft. When we think of a paragraph, we immediately think of a heading device to break a text into parts. (Think of the elaborate heads often seen at the start of medieval manuscripts and the task becomes easier still.) Just where and how to do it belongs to the writer's craft. Hence, we define paragraphing as the "heading craft" to remember this character.
koohiiStory1: To write a paragraph is the craft of grouping sentences on a page.
koohiiStory2: To craft a page well, we need paragraphs.
myStory: đoạn văn. thứ nhân tạo trong trang giấy.
words:
事項(じこう): matter, item, facts
項目(こうもく): item
